template<class GAMECLASS>
void LineEditTest< GAMECLASS >::testLineEditCaption (  )  [inline]

Tests the LineEdit caption.

It simply set a new text to the LineEdit and test if the string given by Caption::getText() is the same.

Tests the LineEdit Focus.
